case.state: Hello, everyone! I hope to have some fun with all of you!
Hello, everyone! I hope to have some fun with all of you!
[This hidden line sets the 'allmen' marker if Kali is the only female at the table. Kali no longer uses this marker, but it's possible that another RWBY character still relies on it.]

A few, please.

These look wonderful~

Oh~
This takes me back...
I do enjoy my husband's poker nights~
Oh... It's been a while since my husband showed me off to his friends...
Looks like it's time for mommy to strip~ A shame there's no men to watch...
It'd be a bit more fun if there were men playing...
Don't worry, Blake, mommy does this all the time, though usually with a few boys to entertain~
Looks like it's time for mommy to strip~
Time for a little fun~
Don't worry, Blake, mommy does this all the time~
It looks like I'll be the first to go~
Oh, dear, sweetie. Mommy's sorry~
It looks like I'll have to get a little naughty~
It looks like I'll be showing off for all of you anyway~
And here I thought I'd win flawlessly.
Clearly I've improved since I last played strip poker.
To think, the last time I played a game like this I was already completed stripped by this point~
It feels nice to play something this high risk. Again~
I'll have to organize a game like this with all my girlfriends and their hubbies when I get home~
Oh, dear, honey. It looks like I'll be going now.
Ah, I lost.
Oh, I was doing well, too.
Ah, I suppose I can't continue this streak.
I'm getting down to the wire now.
Mommy's getting closer~
To think you'll be having me strip for all of you~
Not much left on this old girl~
I suppose I'm still afforded a little bit of modesty.
I'm happy this top is long.
Well, you'll be getting me out of these pants.
I mean, if I'm still winning.
Ghira would love this!
At least now we'll all be nude.
It's not the ears, is it?
Are you a huntress by chance? I might know why I look familiar.
Time traveler? What? No. What on earth brings you to that conclusion?
Boomer? I'm a cat Faunus. Not sure what sort of term that is...
Oh, I'm a cat Faunus.
Hmm? I'm a Faunus. Is boomer some kind of other term?
I suppose I should be mad that you're willing to insult a superior, but I'll accept your compliment.
It seems the next generation is a bit rude to their elders~
I guess I'll save the scolding for a little later.
Who's over the hill!?
Exactly how old do you think I am!?
I'm not that old!
I suppose I'm a little older that what you'd expect, but you don't need to be rude to other people.
Such disrespect in the new generation...
How rude of you.
Is your first instinct REALLY to point out my age!?
And who said anything about being over-the-hill!?
You would think someone of your age would show a bit more respect.
Rather rude of you to say that...
I must say, I'm not pleased with what you're implying.
It's not very polite to point out a woman's age.
Oh, I'd love to tell you! I have all sorts of stories about my daughter and husband!
I'd love to sit and chat about my family!
I can tell you ALL about my little daughter, Blake!
I know I'm a bit up in years compared to most here, but I'm just trying to have a little fun~
Really? Because I think you look wonderful!
Age doesn't necessarily mean you aren't beautiful! I'm sure my husband and his friends would agree~
Please, you don't look a day over 18!
You've still got plenty of good years ahead of you!
Oh, I know PLENTY of older women would love to play games like this~
I'll let you in on a little secret: older women love to play around with games like these~
It's bad to think that you aren't a real woman, Ms. Natsuki.
I'll have you know that my breasts still look lovely!
I'm not wrinkly yet!
My, my, the younger generation is rather rude...
Isn't it past your bedtime, little girl?
I'm sorry I don't cater to your perverted whims.
I do very well to take care of my body, thank you.
Oh, really? Then I guess all my husband's friends have been lying to me.
How bold of you to assume that my husband and I don't get into all sorts of trouble.
How quaint. Someone assuming that being a bit older means that I don't let my husband and his friends do ALL sorts of things to me~
I could call my husband over. He'll bend me right over and show you that he still enjoys my breasts~
I don't know, that horse Faunus seemed to enjoy it when I stepped into his bath~
I'd counter with another insult, but these lips are far better suited to pleasing my husband and his friends~
Looks like it's time for mommy to strip~ A shame there's no men to watch...
It'd be a bit more fun if there were men playing...
Don't worry, Blake, mommy does this all the time, though usually with a few boys to entertain~
Looks like it's time for mommy to strip~
Time for a little fun~
Don't worry, Blake, mommy does this all the time~
Oh, I don't intend to play around~
Oh, heavens no! I'm happily married.
Do you want the fun answer?
Oh, how adorable. No, no, I'm married. I couldn't possibly do that to my husband.
At least this won't be the first time...
Time for mommy to get a little dirty~
It looks like I'll be the first to go~
Oh, dear, sweetie. Mommy's sorry~
It looks like I'll have to get a little naughty~
It looks like I'll be showing off for all of you~
I'm sure most of my friends would say that I'm confident, thank you~
Oh, I'd love to meet him someday, Mr. Jotaro!
Hopefully he's a bit more personable than you, Mr. Jotaro!
Oh, now do you?
I'd love to meet your little friend as well!
I'm a cat Faunus, yes! They're fully real!
Yes, they are real! Wiggle wiggle!
I'd recommend finding someone who wants to have as much fun as you! My husband lets me get away with SO much~
Age is nothing but a number, sweetie!
It helps to have a healthy sex life, and to always explore fun new ways of spicing things up~
Well, if you play a few more games like these, you'll gain that confidence in no time~
My husband likes to let me have fun. And I LOVE having fun~
You see, Pit, my husband and I like to have a little fun every now and again~
Because my husband will LOVE it when I tell him ALL about what I did here~
Oh, it's perfectly fine, I promise. My husband just couldn't make it.
I suppose it's about time~
Let's not get ahead of ourselves just yet.
You still have a ways to go before you get to the good part~
Oh, another loss...
What to remove...?
Not much left after this.
Mommy's getting closer~
I suppose I'm still afforded a little bit of modesty.
Well, you'll be getting me out of these pants.
Oh, dear...
Sorry, dear. It looks like I'll be showing off a bit more than you would want...
Well... I'm sorry, Blake.
Ghira would have loved to show me off were he here...
With other people? Hmm~
Oh, my! I'll be exposing my breasts!
Time to get naked, then...
Well... I'm not alone.
I believe this would be the time for a rude joke about my anatomy...
Looks like it's time for mommy to strip~ A shame there's no men to watch...
It'd be a bit more fun if there were men playing...
Don't worry, Blake, mommy does this all the time, though usually with a few boys to entertain~
Looks like it's time for mommy to strip~
Time for a little fun~
Don't worry, Blake, mommy does this all the time~
It looks like I'll be the next to go~
Oh, dear, sweetie. Mommy's sorry~
It looks like I'll have to get a little naughty~
It looks like I'll be showing off for all of you~
To think all of you men will see my breasts~
This won't be the first time I've been topless for a group of men~
Oh, this reminds me of when my husband brought his friends over for poker~
Ah, well. I suppose it has been a while.
A shame.
So early for me to lose. I hope this isn't a repeat of the last time I played one of these strip games~
I did do rather poorly last time I played one of these strip games. Hopefully this goes a little better!
Oh, dear, honey. It looks like I've finally lost one.
At least I have room for error.
What to remove...?
Well, I guess I'm playing poorly.
Mommy's getting closer~
It looks like Mommy's going to lose a bit more~
I'm losing right now. I wonder if I'll have to get completely naked first~
I suppose I'll be removing my pants.
I thought I'd do a bit better...
Well... All I have at the moment are my hakama.
Oh... I'll be flashing you all now, then...
Well... I suppose I'll go first.
I thought I'd do a little better...
Oh, you know my daughter?
Yes, Blake is my daughter.
Oh, you must know my daughter!
You think I'm being shy? You have no idea, little miss.
Is that really appropriate to ask a lady?
Now is that really a nice question to ask?
Old enough to know it's past your bedtime, little lady~
Age doesn't matter to a cat. Nine lives, after all~
Old enough to know it's past your bed time.
Old enough to have been around the block~
Is that an appropriate question to ask a lady?
I'm old enough to know that that's a rather rude question.
Old enough to know how to have a good time~
They key to aging is a healthy sex life~
Grace isn't the term I would use~
Maybe you'll learn manners when you finally grow up.
Honey, you think YOU'RE the pinnacle of beauty?
I'd say my daughter is far more beautiful than you, plus she doesn't have such a rotten attitude.
Back in the day!?
Who do you think you are, Missy?
If you ask me, your age isn't the problem.
Some of us like to make friends at these sorts of events~ It makes for a little more fun down the line!
My house burned down while I was being attacked by terrorists. I'm not ignorant, young lady.
You'd be surprised how effective a dinner tray is in combat. I'm a housewife, not a fighter, but I can hold my own.
How funny! I used to call my daughter, "Successor to the Bellabooty."
I used to call my daughter, "Perpetually Single," for a long time.
I'll pass.
I'm not sure I like your pandering attempts, Ms. Ladybug.
Showing off is ALL I do, honey.
Glad to see someone appreciates my style~
If you insist~
I'm sure my husband and his friends agree.
At least this isn't the first time I've stripped for people other than my husband.
It's been a while since I stripped for someone other than my husband.
It's like I'm a newlywed again~
I'm glad I'm used to stripping for strangers~
This won't be all that much. Not yet, at least~
I'm sure I'll get to have some fun soon enough~
Last of my small things. Almost time to show off~
And that's the last of my decent things. Next I'll be presenting myself for you~
Sorry, Blake! Mommy might have to have some fun~
Don't look at mommy, sweetie~
I can't say I've heard that name, but he sounds lovely!
I'm sure he's a lovely young man.
I'm sure he's a lovely young man!
Am I already making you that much more of a man, Pit?
Black and white will always make a nice contrast. My daughter inherited that style, as well.
A bit old fashioned, even where I'm from.
I like the splash of color more than anything!
I never much understood cinchers. Must be a new trend.
Oh, I would love it if you showed me the new fashion trends over here!
Why, yes! I am from Menagerie~
Kuo Kuana specifically.
And you're from Vale, I assume.
Aww, I always hated when my husband decided not to punish me~
And I was looking forward to your punishment, little lady~
Don't be like that, Pit~
Am I really too much woman for you to handle?
C'mon, Pit~ Just let your body tell you how you should feel~

Inferior!?
Aren't you a proud one?
Honestly? That's your response?
I'm not intimidated by a brat like you.
I'd say the only thing my daughter and I don't share is my... romantic tendencies~
Blake and I are pretty similar if you ignore my... proclivities.
It IS a more mature look, Ms. Ladybug.
My husband prefers me in thongs. I can't imagine why.
Don't feel that bad, Pit. This is how you keep it exciting in your older years~
I came here of my own volition. Don't feel bad about staring~
Be sure to watch~

Don't worry, I'm not shy~

It looks like you boys get the full show~
Hey big boy~

Such a rush~

I suppose I'll take these sleeves off.

This won't result in much of a change.
At least it'll be a little bit exciting!
There goes the last of my small things.
I suppose I don't have much left.
You almost have me now.
Next will be my hakama~
You've almost got me to my naughtier things~
Mommy's all out of small things~
Don't worry about taking things too far. That's how my husband and I like it~
Ghira won't even be able to enjoy this part...
What a thrill!
Oh... You're all watching...
Now I'll really be showing off.
It's been a while since someone other than my husband saw my breasts...
Here I go~
I must admit, having my daughter here is a bit strange...
Now just to slide these off...
Time to show off...
You missed a good game, honey.
It's been a while since I did something like this, especially without my husband around.
Here's a little reward for making me come this far~
Me shaving has nothing to do with me being a pervert. I mean... I guess one would say that I am... Still, no correlation.
Some like a tease.
I doubt you'd do half the things I've done with my husband.
Oh, why thank you! I do try to take care of myself!
Oh, stop it! I'm just a little old lady enjoying herself!
Oh, believe me, I'm more than a little experienced~
They do say a healthy sex life keeps you young~
How nice of you to say that!
Just don't confuse me and my daughter for sisters!
Oh, why thank you! I do try to take care of myself!

Why thank you! I've always been told I'm a bit youthful.
Oh, how kind of you to say that!

Cat therapy!?

Oh, you choose the word minx, do you?
Honey, this is FAR from the first time~
My husband enjoys his little kitty~
My husband is perfectly fine, I promise.
This is far from the first time I've done something like this after I was married~
Oh, I love my husband! He's perfectly fine with me having a bit of fun now and then.
I'm usually the one resting on my husband's chest. He's FAR too big for that! Though I'm not opposed to a little smothering~

Oh, my husband is a fan. His friends are as well~

It's not worth the trouble so much as the looks my husband's friends give~
My husband would agree~

Some of us already know what our partner likes~
It will never hurt to ask. You might get rewarded like I do~
"Holy cats?"
Oh, he doesn't know what he's missing~
He was so close to joining me... A shame.
My daughter is older than you!
Some of us have partners with a preference.
Clearly someone is single...
Husband. I'm happily married.
If there's one thing I don't mind~
No, actually. I expect a little class when someone asks something like that.
A reputation? For what? Being well-kempt?
Maybe I was expecting it~
Oh, it's adorable how you think I can't hear you whispering~
I can hear you whispering, young man~
Well, now I'm a bit exposed...
You're all staring~
Do you like?
A shame Ghira missed this. We're getting to his favorite part~
I love showing off for my husband's friends~
This brings me back to when my husband and I played around~
Don't worry, Blake, this isn't anything new to me~

This is a rear well-known to my husband's friends~
Don't feel bad about looking~
Feel free to peek~

If you see my daughter, tell her to loosen up a bit and join you next time you come here!
Feel free to invite her if you plan on coming again~
Oh, now why would he be jealous?
Oh, he'd be jealous of you getting to know little old me, huh?
I wonder why he'd be so jealous~
I'd love to tell you all about the fashion trends from where I'm from!
I'd love to have a little chat about fashion if you're free. Maybe over... some hot cocoa?
Honey, this road isn't even off the beaten path~
You'd be surprised how many avenues open up when you have a little fun at my age~
It must be a cultural thing.
As long as your punishment isn't more stripping~

You want to leave NOW!? But I'm so close to removing my hakama~

I mean, I guess you could mistake that if you were blind...
I'm shaved, if you must know. I would NEVER let it get that wild.
Do you want to repeat that, young man?
I'm a what!?
You say that as if I can't hear you, Mr. Jotaro!
What a rude young man.
Oh, don't worry, Pit. He'd be perfectly fine with you taking a little peek. Or maybe a little more~
No worries, Pit. This is how me and my husband have fun~
It's okay, my husband loves showing me off~
A healthy sex life is important for marriage~
Oh, it's been FOREVER since I've been a toy~

...A lady shouldn't reveal ALL secrets...

This little lady enjoys her *swing* set, so you aren't far off~
You know what they say about cat tongues~
Oh, this kitty LOVES to play around~
Oh, it's my husband. He rewards me, so it's more than worth it~

My husband sure makes it worth it~
A what to where, you say?
I know my husband likes a cat's rear in his face~
Glad to know age hasn't caught up to me just yet~
I'm telling you, a healthy sex life keeps you young~
Glad to know I fit in with the young crowd~
I don't exactly care for the pun...
My husband agrees~
For once, I'm going to have to deny such a request.
Aww, what's the matter Pit? Cat got your tongue?
Aww, Pit, is this your first time seeing a mature lady like me?
I may look better, but I feel much better with my husband.

So what do you think?

I'll play it safe a bit longer.
I apologize. Usually I take off something a bit more adventurous~

And now we continue on~

I'm down to my last line of defense, so please...
Do go on.
Now, will you make things even?
Do make it worth my time.
I'm already topless. There's not much more to go.
Want to help this kitty?

Oh! Finally~

There's a good boy.
Nice to see people that fight alongside each other partake in other activities.
Always a good time playing these games with someone you've fought alongside~
Do you two normally play these sorts of games together?
What an interesting pair you two make. Do you play these sorts of games together often?
You two have to be related, right?
Siblings, I imagine?
I know a pair of twins that look just like each other! Actually... KNEW would be a bit more appropriate...
A strong family resemblance...
You're quite similar in build. It's rare to see siblings SO close in appearance.
Oh, do you two work with each other?
It's nice to see people that fight together engage outside of work.
I'm surprised to see such an age difference. Do you two know each other?
What is it like to be playing this with someone you know? I always get excited~
Such a young man to be stripping, and with such older women around~
I've never seen such an age gap between friends who partake in this sort of game.
How did you get such a young man to work under you, Palutena?
I've been wanting to have a little fun with a younger man. How did you meet Pit, Palutena?
I don't suppose you can see with that on, can you?
I must say, I never much liked the blindfold look.
You can see, right?
Covering your eyes doesn't make us go away~
You look like you're from Atlas.
The technology you speak of sounds like something from Atlas.
Are you from Atlas, by chance? You look a lot like a certain family.
I would assume that, from the way you speak, you're from Atlas.
You must have been able to see up until this point.
Judging from your reactions, you've been able to see...
Now you can look at me completely unfiltered~
No more things to prevent you from staring~
Your turn, handsome~
I wonder if you're bigger than my husband~
I like my men big and strong~
You remind me of my husband~
I see my husband in you. I like that~
Men like you do wonders for this little kitty~
Mommy's been looking forward to this one~
Rather... feminine looking...
What an alluring look you have.
I've never seen a man as androgynous as you before...
Your turn~
I like the easygoing type~
Such a young man~

If you lose the attitude, you'd be a perfect little toy~
Rude, but hunky~
I'm not a fan of the attitude, but Mommy likes her men big~
Such a big man~
Such a bold young man~
Such a lively one~
Where's all that confidence coming from? Mommy wants to know~
A man among men, I see~
I'm not one to stereotype, but I get a bad feeling from that man.
I'm a little nervous around that man...

scene.directive: And that milf that invited you to her place after a game of strip poker...
Oh, hello! I've been waiting for you!
Hold on, hold on, come right in!
As you can see, we've already started!
I'll show you to our tea room and you can join my husband!
Please, please, sit anywhere! I'll be right out with some tea.

I'm glad to see you making friends, dear.
We were just wrapping things up here.
You enjoy broadening your cultural experience with some tea.
Right, well, I think that's enough for tonight.
I'll show our guest to the other room. Ghira, be quick, dear.
Let's show them how we enjoy ourselves, dear~
He can have you after I'm finished.
I'm glad to see her enjoy herself so much.
You're free to come back any time!
You're free to come back any time!
